TI: [Arousal thresholds during stimulation of brain structures in nonanesthetized cats].
AB: In cats, there was no apparent difference between the average low thresholds for evoking EEG arousal when stimulating the mesencephalic RF, thalamic CM or some cortical structures (sensorimotor area, inferior part of auditory Ep). Most of other cortical points had much higher thresholds (g. lateralis anterior, g. suprasylvius posterior, g. ectosylvius med. and sup.). The possible role of some cortical and mesencephalic structures in the brain activating mechanisms is discussed.
TT: Porogi reaktsii aktivatsii pri razdrazhenii raznykh struktur mozga u nenarkotizirovannoi
TA: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova
JT: Fiziologicheskii zhurnal SSSR imeni I. M. Sechenova
SO: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova. 1975 May;61(5):681-9.
